name: Holy Water
description: Water blessed by a priest used for protection and blessing.

name: Rosary
description: A string of beads used for prayer and meditation on the life of Christ.

name: Scapular
description: A devotional garment signifying dedication to Mary and Christ.

name: Crucifix
description: A cross with the figure of Christ crucified, symbol of sacrifice and salvation.

name: Saint Benedict Medal
description: A medal invoking St. Benedict’s intercession for protection against evil.

name: Prayer Book
description: A book containing Catholic prayers and devotions.
